CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(ClosedDate),'', TEXT(CEILING((5* FLOOR((DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) - DATE(1985,6,24)) /7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) - DATE(1985,6,24), 7) + MIN(IF(ClosedDate < DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)) & ' ' & MID(TEXT(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATE(1985,6,24)) & ' 13:30:00')),12,8)),0,1), 24 / 9 * (MOD(ClosedDate - DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATE(1985,6,24)) & ' 13:30:00'), 1))))) - (5 * FLOOR((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985,6,24)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985,6,24), 7) + MIN(IF(CreatedDate < DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) & ' ' & MID(TEXT(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATE(1985,6,24)) & ' 13:30:00')),12,8)),0,1), 24 / 9 * (MOD(CreatedDate - DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATE(1985,6,24)) & ' 13:30:00'), 1))))))))
CustomField.label: Case Duration
